title: Phoenix Bar
description: Texas born, MC bred. Grit is used to rotating his women like he rotates his socks, but that all changes when he meets Phoenix. Phoenix is hiding from a past filled with hurt. Just as she finds love with Grit, the pains of her past are going to come back to burn her. Can Grit keep Phoenix safe or will Phoenix die trying to protect those she loves from the flames of her past?
author: Annelise Reynolds
